com.mygdx.game

Class Chancellor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Chancellor

  • public class Chancellor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the Chancellor mini game. It will make the chancellor appear on a random a random tile
    Version:
    Assessment 4 An executable version of the game can be found at: http://gandhi-inc.me/downloads/assessment4.jar Our website is: www.gandhi-inc.me
    Author:
    Gandhi-Inc.
